Added vibration reminder settings in the band setting
Adjusted heart rate interface and heart rate history interface - previously only display 4 heart rate intervals, and correct interval name
Added FAQ
Added Fahrenheit and centigrade switch
Added instabug feedback system
Timeline between current data and historical data show inconsistent.Unified to display time in reverse order
The date of birth is limited to 1900 - Current Time
Solve the problem that the total score in home page is not updated
Adjusted UI in home page
Fix the weather bug
Vibration reminder settings, currently supports Japanese and English.
Change the weather service logic
Change the weather interface
Fix bug that different calendar selection result in different dates
Resolve DFU upgrade hidden bug
Added firmware upgrade reminder
Solve the problem that the power sometimes displayed as 0 when the bracelet is connected in home page
App name changed to iwownfit pro
